cast.overview: A civilian oil rig crew is recruited to conduct a search and rescue effort when a nuclear submarine mysteriously sinks. One diver soon finds himself on a spectacular odyssey 25,000 feet below the ocean's surface where he confronts a mysterious force that has the power to change the world or destroy it.
cast.title: The Abyss

also_known_as: Captain Pierce Oliver Kidd Brewer, Jr.
details.biography: Pierce Oliver Brewer, Jr. was an American actor, land developer, and professional underwater diver. He adopted the name "Capt. Kidd" after his father, Julius "Kidd" Brewer, a former award-winning coach and land developer.  Growing up in Raleigh, North Carolina, Brewer, Jr. moved to Los Angeles where he became known for his appearances in the James Cameron films "Piranha II: The Spawning" (1982) and "The Abyss" (1989).  Years of scuba diving off the coast of North Carolina helped in both of these roles.  The film "The Abyss" was dedicated to his memory.
details.name: Pierce Oliver Brewer, Jr.
